_header: As long as I am rich reputed
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 201; and cf. 4425, 4481, 6468.
_description: Two couplets in a series of proverbs followed by other scattered single lines and couplets

BLHar2321.Transcription: As longe as I am riche reputedwith solem vyce I am setbut wealthe away oute wornenot one wyll say good morne
BLHar2321.Note: Added to lower margin by a later hand.
BLHar2321.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.207.
Whiting,  Bartlett Jere. 
             Proverbs, Sentences, and Proverbial Phrases from English Writings
                Mainly before 1500.
         Cambridge, MA: Belknap, 1968: R107.
